list.name: Changes
list.comment: Went through all files and deleted all unused code or getter,setters,constructers etc.... got rid of any small errors like lines ignored or values being final

task.summary: Default task
GitHub repository and folders made for CRUD project group g.
Created test folders for all CCRUD_Operations and a test connection showing how the current sql is connected to our project
Created a class called WorkoutRecorder which will record a persons workout while also acting as a list to store and display all previous workouts
Workout recorder working in menu to allow user to record workouts needs some small tiding in code as few small issue with displays
Workout recorder working in menu looks better
Workout recorder working in menu looks better
Workout recorder working in menu looks better
All CRUD Test are working also added an admin will plans to only allow that to access all crud funtions with a password and username and then allow user to only read
Cleaned menu and organised switch statement will all planned functions also made a start or password and user function
Added classes for repmax and bmr admin login made and working will only allow access to all crud operations if logged in
Moved joshs code to new section
Just added comments on work that needs to be done
Just added comments on work that needs to be done
Added an updated menu application starts with a menu to login or make account and then checks log in details to bring user to menu that suits them
Added an updated menu application starts with a menu to login or make account and then checks log in details to bring user to menu that suits them
Menu tidied more with a new option to allow logging out and goig back to intial menu.SQL database has been updated to include more data and final touches to all testing files
menu and users updated new option to make mulitple users and to log in and out of them

Login function and ability to create infinite users finished and working.Menu was further tidied up from a few bugs like logging out after on choice now will continue till logged out of exited. 1 rep and Bmr implemented to menu,and bug removed where these crashed from closing the scanner. Next steps are to add try catches to user inputs as these are causing issues and ending application.

Added a new class called InputUtils that has a function to handle user inputs of any type and will check to make sure the right type of form is entered otherwise it will repeat a prompt.This has got rid of the crashing issue when users mis-inputted. This has also reduced code by a few lines making it far more understanable
Just commiting again as last one was done off master
Went through all files and deleted all unused code or getter,setters,constructers etc.... got rid of any small errors like lines ignored or values being final

MESSAGE.value: GitHub repository and folders made for CRUD project group g.
Created test folders for all CCRUD_Operations and a test connection showing how the current sql is connected to our project
Created a class called WorkoutRecorder which will record a persons workout while also acting as a list to store and display all previous workouts
Workout recorder working in menu to allow user to record workouts needs some small tiding in code as few small issue with displays
Workout recorder working in menu looks better
All CRUD Test are working also added an admin will plans to only allow that to access all crud funtions with a password and username and then allow user to only read
Cleaned menu and organised switch statement will all planned functions also made a start or password and user function
Added classes for repmax and bmr admin login made and working will only allow access to all crud operations if logged in
Moved joshs code to new section
Just added comments on work that needs to be done
Added an updated menu application starts with a menu to login or make account and then checks log in details to bring user to menu that suits them
Menu tidied more with a new option to allow logging out and goig back to intial menu.SQL database has been updated to include more data and final touches to all testing files
menu and users updated new option to make mulitple users and to log in and out of them

Login function and ability to create infinite users finished and working.Menu was further tidied up from a few bugs like logging out after on choice now will continue till logged out of exited. 1 rep and Bmr implemented to menu,and bug removed where these crashed from closing the scanner. Next steps are to add try catches to user inputs as these are causing issues and ending application.

Added a new class called InputUtils that has a function to handle user inputs of any type and will check to make sure the right type of form is entered otherwise it will repeat a prompt.This has got rid of the crashing issue when users mis-inputted. This has also reduced code by a few lines making it far more understanable
Just commiting again as last one was done off master
Went through all files and deleted all unused code or getter,setters,constructers etc.... got rid of any small errors like lines ignored or values being final
